page.title: 12CLUBS CLOWNE.
page.content: THERE ARE A WIDE RANGE OF CLUBS AND SOCIETIES FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES IN CLOWNE. FOR VERY YOUNG CHILDREN THERE IS A PLAYGROUP AND A MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP HELD ON MORNINGS FROM MONDAY TO THURSDAY. THERE ARE TWO BROWNIE PACKS AND ONE CUB PACK.FOR OLDER CHILDREN THERE ARE GIRL GUIDES AND SCOUTS.THERE IS A YOUTH CLUB RUN BY THE COUNTY COUNCIL AND A CLUB RUN BY THE SALVATION ARMY. FOR OTHERS THERE IS A FLORAL SOCIETY AND A NATIONAL HISTORY CLUB AMONGST OTHERS. FOR THE ELDERLY THERE ARE A NUMBER OF CLUBS SUCH AS A DARBY AND JOAN CLUB,AN O.A.P.CLUB,A MONDAY CLUB AND A THURSDAY CLUB. THERE ARE ALSO A NUMBER OF PUBLIC HOUSES AND THREE CLUBS.
